languages.text: On a successful {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g}, the shot explodes, dealing 20 {g|Encyclopedia:ImpactDamage}impact damage{/g} to everyone in the {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area of effect{/g} around the target.

languages.text: 子弹{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}目标之后会爆炸，对目标{g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}{/g}周围所有生物造成20点{g|Encyclopedia:ImpactDamage}冲击伤害{/g}。
languages.original_text: On a successful {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g}, the shot explodes, dealing 20 {g|Encyclopedia:ImpactDamage}impact damage{/g} to everyone in the {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area of effect{/g} around the target.

traits.locale_text: 需要50点{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}力量{/g}才能使用。暴击率提高10%。{g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}{/g}

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}攻撃が当たる{/g}と弾が爆発して、ターゲットの周囲にいる{g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}効果範囲内{/g}の全員に20の{g|Encyclopedia:ImpactDamage}衝撃ダメージ{/g}を与える。
languages.original_text: On a successful {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g}, the shot explodes, dealing 20 {g|Encyclopedia:ImpactDamage}impact damage{/g} to everyone in the {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area of effect{/g} around the target.

traits.locale_text: 行使するためには{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}体力{/g}50が必要となる。クリティカル{g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}ヒット率{/g}が10％増加する。

languages.text: Al {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}impactar{/g}, el disparo explota infligiendo 20 de {g|Encyclopedia:ImpactDamage}daño de impacto{/g} a todos en un {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}área de efecto{/g} centrada en el objetivo.
languages.original_text: On a successful {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g}, the shot explodes, dealing 20 {g|Encyclopedia:ImpactDamage}impact damage{/g} to everyone in the {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area of effect{/g} around the target.

traits.locale_text: Se necesita 50 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Fuerza{/g} para equiparlo. Otorga +10 % de {g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}probabilidad de impacto{/g} crítico.

languages.text: Bei einem erfolgreichen {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}Treffer{/g}, explodiert das Geschoss und verursacht bei allen Kreaturen im {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}Wirkungsbereich{/g} um das Ziel 20 {g|Encyclopedia:ImpactDamage}Aufprallschaden{/g}.
languages.original_text: On a successful {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g}, the shot explodes, dealing 20 {g|Encyclopedia:ImpactDamage}impact damage{/g} to everyone in the {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area of effect{/g} around the target.

traits.locale_text: Benötigt 50 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Stärke{/g}, um genutzt werden zu können. Gewährt +10% kritische {g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}Trefferchance{/g}.

languages.text: Après un {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}coup{/g} porté, la munition explose et inflige 20 points de {g|Encyclopedia:ImpactDamage}dégâts d'impact{/g} à tous les personnages dans la {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}zone d'effet{/g} autour de la cible.
languages.original_text: On a successful {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g}, the shot explodes, dealing 20 {g|Encyclopedia:ImpactDamage}impact damage{/g} to everyone in the {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area of effect{/g} around the target.

traits.locale_text: Son utilisation requiert 50 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Force{/g}. Confère +10 % de {g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}chances d'infliger un coup{/g} critique.
